Introduction
This topic contains information on errors in RPC records, including
information requestsÂ from RPCs in cases identified by DMDC as containing apparent discrepancies

title: M21-1, Part VI, Subpart ii, Chapter 4, Section D - Reconciliation of Department of Veterans Affairs (VA), Department of Defense (DoD), and Department of Transportation (DoT) Records
citation: Part VI, Subpart ii, Chapter 4, Section D
